advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.description: Fine-tune PowerClimate behavior. Leave fields empty to use defaults. Changes take effect immediately.

data_description.min_setpoint_override: Absolute minimum temperature sent to any pump (default: 16°C)
data_description.max_setpoint_override: Absolute maximum temperature sent to any pump (default: 30°C)
data_description.assist_timer_seconds: Duration a condition must remain true before action is taken (default: 300s)
data_description.assist_on_eta_threshold_minutes: Turn assist pumps ON if ETA exceeds this (default: 60min)
data_description.assist_off_eta_threshold_minutes: Turn assist pumps OFF if ETA drops below this (default: 15min)
data_description.assist_min_on_minutes: Block turning assist pumps OFF until they've been ON for at least this long (default: 20min)
data_description.assist_min_off_minutes: Block turning assist pumps ON until they've been OFF for at least this long (default: 10min)
data_description.assist_water_temp_threshold: Turn assist pumps ON when water reaches this temperature (default: 40°C)
data_description.assist_stall_temp_delta: Temperature difference threshold for stall detection (default: 0.5°C)
